text: Yehoshua Porath () (January 13, 1938 - November 24, 2019) was an Israeli historian and professor emeritus of Middle East history. Porath was a lecturer in the History of Muslim Countries at the Hebrew University of Jerusalem.יהושע פורת, המנדט המפוקפק של תום שגב , תכלת 9, אביב התש"ס / 2000 He unsuccessfully ran for the Knesset in 1992 and in 1996. Porath died on November 24, 2019 in Jerusalem at the age of 81. ==References== Category:1938 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Hebrew University of Jerusalem faculty Category:Israeli historians
title: Yehoshua Porath
